programme.title: Project Mercury, The Mars Express & The Soyuz Launch System
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E02, Project Mercury Begins - The start of NASA & America's first manned space program. Mars Express - The European Space Agency's Mars Satellite. The Soyuz Launch System - The gradual evolution of Russia's Soyuz launcher.

programme.title: Project Mercury Advancement, Camera Tracking & The International Space Station
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E03, Project Mercury Advances - America's first manned space program finally puts a man in orbit. Camera Tracking - The array of special cameras that follow a spacecraft at launch. The International Space Station - The building and operation.

programme.title: Project Gemini, Venus Express, EMU & Deep Space Communication
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E04, Project Gemini Commences - Did Gemini give the US a lead in the space race? Venus Express - The last days of ESA's Venus probe. EMU - NASA's Extravehicular Mobility Unit. Deep Space Communications - ESA's worldwide network of giant dishes.

programme.title: Project Gemini Advances, Cassini at Saturn & More About Mars
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E05, Project Gemini Advances - NASA refines the techniques needed for rendezvous. Cassini at Saturn - In the Cassini probe's final years of activity, its handlers are asking it to do more complex and risky assignments.

programme.title: Episode 2

programme.title: Part 3

programme.title: Part 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks, S01E04, The streets of East London shake under a civil war bering fought between the Daleks, as the Doctor forces the Dalek Emperor to reveal himself to be Davros, waging one last battle.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Battlefield, S01E01, As UNIT is transporting a nuclear warhead around Carbury, knights in armour arrive to continue waging a war that began thousands of years ago, but in a wholly different dimension.

programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Daleks, S01E07, The Thals and the time travellers attack the Daleks from all sides as the Daleks start the countdown to release deadly doses of radiation into the atmosphere.

programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Planet of Giants, S01E03, The Doctor and Susan are reunited with Ian and Barbara. As Barbara's health rapidly deteriorates, the crew find the formula for DN6, the pesticide that Forrester was prepared to kill for, and which could now be responsible for killing Barbara.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E16, A police investigator discovers a letter written 16 years earlier that provides clues to a woman's murder. And a firearms expert supplies the evidence that South Carolina authorities need to put a man on trial in 2002 for a murder committed in 1961.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E07, A woman's fall from a cliff in the Grand Canyon leads police to uncover a series of grisly murders, and investigators smoke out a killer when they find crucial DNA evidence on his cigarette butts.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E03, While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E15, A new fingerprint identification system helps detectives track down a killer after three years of searching. And a Georgia investigator gets to the bottom of a 16-year-old murder case when he discovers the victim's body -- in the bottom of a well.

programme.title: Lone Survivor
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E27, In early 1984, three-year-old Vanessa Bennett becomes the lone survivor of her family's brutal murder. Initial investigators suspect a serial killer is at large, but decades pass before DNA narrows the suspect pool to one man.

programme.title: The Voice In The Lake
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E01, When 31-year-old real estate appraiser Mike Williams mysteriously vanishes while duck hunting in the Florida swamps in December of 2000, authorities suspect he accidentally drowned. For sixteen years his disappearance remains a mystery.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E10, Klan leader Sam Bowers goes on trial for ordering the murder of an African-American storeowner 32 years prior, and investigators reopen the unsolved case of an African-American truck driver who was forced to leap to his death from a bridge by Klan member

programme.title: Daddy Knows Best/Operation Jambalaya
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E3005, A detective works for 15 years to nab a man who murdered and dismembered his wife to hide the sexual abuse of his children. Then, 20 years after the shooting murder of a gas station attendant, detectives get a lead.

programme.title: Missing and Murdered
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E26, In Cree culture, a promise is sacred. When Cree woman Shirley Soosay goes missing in 1980, her niece Violet promises her grandmother that she will bring Shirley home.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E18, New DNA technology and the national DNA databank help police hunt down a rapist-killer 11 years after he committed his crimes, and a detective's painstaking recreation of a woman's shooting death proves it wasn't an accident.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E15, Police solve a murder when divers find a skeleton in a car at the bottom of a river, and a dead dog's DNA helps crack open a 6-year-old case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E14, In Wisconsin, advances in forensic clay modeling help investigators identify a murder victim whose skin was stripped from her head, neck, and legs. And in California, police track down two boys who enjoy satanic rituals and setting fires.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E13, Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: The Lost Patient
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E25, In 1979 Janie Landers disappears from a home for the impaired--the latest consequence of the facility's history of neglect. When Janie's body is found, there are many suspects but it is years before the killer is found.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E24, A mother is suspected in the murders of two of her daughters when her third daughter finally convinces police to reopen two cold cases.

programme.title: The Bone Keeper
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E22, In December 1985, when human bones are discovered in the woods, it puts an end to the search for missing teen David Reed. David's skull fractures point to murder; but it will be decades before investigators can find his killer.

programme.title: Texas Drifter/Fingerprints/Rose Among Thorns
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E03, From England to Texas to Georgia, I.R. will go inside cold case units and watch as police use ballistics testing, old fashioned fingerprints and a new DNA data bank for criminals, to crack open the mysteries of unsolved crimes.
MST3K: The Batwoman, 20220819000000 +0000, Emily's crew watch a scantily-clad Mexican superhero take on a mad scientist and his aquatic super-soldiers in THE BATWOMAN (1968).

MST3K: The Shape Of Things To Come, 20220930000000 +0000, Emily's crew watch three humans and their robot friend defend the moon colonies in H.G. Well's THE SHAPE OF THINGS TO COME (1979).

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Hired! (Part 1)
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E17, The first part of this essential guide to modern car sales techniques.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Hired! (Part 2)
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E18, Advance your career by finishing this enlightening two-part short featuring timeless sales advice.
MST3K: The Mask, 20221028000000 +0000, For MST3K's first-ever Halloween episode, Jonah's crew watch THE MASK (1961) in 3D! Jonah teaches the bots about Halloween.
MST3K: The Bubble, 20221111000000 +0000, Joel's crew watch as a married couple find themselves trapped in a mysterious town in THE BUBBLE (1966). The test subjects hatch a plan to escape.
MST3K: The Christmas Dragon, 20221216000000 +0000, All three hosts watch a group of precocious orphans attempt save a dying Father Christmas in THE CHRISTMAS DRAGON (2014).

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Phantom Creeps - Chapter 1: The Menacing Power
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E10, The first installment of the 1939 serial starring Bela Lugosi.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Phantom Creeps - Chapter 2: Death Stalks The Highways
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E11, Bela Lugosi stars as Dr. Zorka, inventor of a lethal mechanical spider.

Film Crew The Giant of Marathon, 20071009070000 +0000, The Film Crew rip apart B-Movie legend Steve Reeves and The Giant of Marathon.

A Tale of Two Cities, 19801202000000 +0000, Based on Charles Dickens' classic, two identical men (both played by Chris Sarandon) - one from England and one from France - fall for the same woman during the height of the French Revolution.

A Way Back Home, 20130601000000 +0000, When a young musician returns to his hometown at Christmastime, he repairs old wounds and learns the power of forgiveness. Inspired by the paintings of Norman Rockwell. Stars Danny Glover, Austin Stowell and Kayla Ewell.

A Painted House, 20030427000000 +0000, 10-year-old Luke had never kept a secret or told a lie. But when two groups of migrant workers-and two dangerous men-come to work the family's Arkansas cotton farm, mysteries suddenly flood Luke's world.

After All These Years, 20130420000000 +0000, When a woman is wrongly accused of the death of her ex-husband, she sets out to solve the murder mystery and find the real killer before the day of the funeral, when she is to be taken into custody.

After the Glory, 19921129000000 +0000, A group of WWII veterans returning to their small midwestern town , find in the strong-arm tactics of local politicians, the same tyranny they went off to fight against and band together to defeat it at home.

programme.title: Lost and Found
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E01, Hallmark Original Series. A plank is discovered in the mine, Jack Thornton tries to discover the owner.

programme.title: Cease and Desist
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E02, Hallmark Original Series. All the widows in Coal Valley receive eviction notices from the Coal Company.

programme.title: A Telling Silence
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E03, Hallmark Original Series. Elizabeth helps a mute student who is struggling to cope with death.

programme.title: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E04, Hallmark Original Series. Schoolteacher Elizabeth and Constable Jack's relationship starts to heat up.
An Uncommon Grace, 20170212000000 +0000, Grace Connor, a military nurse formerly stationed in Afghanistan, hopes that moving to a farm in rural Ohio will help her recover from the ravages of war.

Little John, 20020505000000 +0000, An estranged father's failing health forces a reunion between a judge and the child she gave up for adoption. Stars Ving Rhames, Gloria Reuben, Patty Duke, and Robert Bailey, Jr. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

A Painted House, 20030427000000 +0000, 10-year-old Luke had never kept a secret or told a lie. But when two groups of migrant workers-and two dangerous men-come to work the family's Arkansas cotton farm, mysteries suddenly flood Luke's world.

programme.title: Memento Mori
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E08, When Vala (Claudia Black) is kidnapped by Trust members acting under the orders of the Goa'uld Athena, an accident causes her to lose all memory of who she is and where she came from. Also starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Company Of Thieves
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E09, Lt. Col. Cameron Mitchell (Ben Browder) goes undercover to track down the Odyssey, which SG-1 believes was hijacked by the Lucian Alliance. Also starring Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, Claudia Black, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: The Quest (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E10, SG-1 finds the planet where they believe the Sangraal is. Forced to forge temporary alliances with Adria (guest star Morena Baccarin) and Ba'al (guest star Cliff Simon) they undertake a quest to find it. Starring Ben Browder and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Quest, The: Part II
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E11, Discovering the frozen body of Merlin (guest star Matthew Walker), SG-1 works to help him build the Sangraal before Adria (guest star Morena Baccarin) and her Ori army can track them down. Starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Line In The Sand
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E12, Hoping to use Merlin's phasing device to hide a village from the Ori army, something goes wrong forcing Mitchell (Ben Browder) and a critically injured Carter (Amanda Tapping) to hide themselves out of phase from an occupation of Ori soldiers.

programme.title: The Road Not Taken
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E13, An experiment goes wrong leaving Lt. Colonel Samantha Carter (Amanda Tapping) trapped in a parallel reality where martial law has been enforced and Earth is under attack from the Ori. Also starring Ben Browder, Christopher Judge, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: The Shroud
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E14, When Daniel Jackson turns up as a Prior asking SG-1 to aid him in a plan that might very well be a trap, it's up to Maj. Gen. Jack O'Neill and the team to not only save Jackson's life, but possibly end the war with the Ori once and for all.

programme.title: Bounty
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E15, After Netan (Eric Steinberg), and the Lucian Alliance, are undermined by SG-1 yet again, he decides to put a bounty out on their heads. Starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, Claudia Black, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Bad Guys
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E16, Mistaken for rebels on an alien planet, SG-1 must play the part of hostage takers in hopes to buy themselves enough time to be rescued before they're executed. Starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Talion
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E17, Barely surviving the bombing massacre of a peaceful Jaffa summit, Teal'c (Christopher Judge) must go rogue to track down and stop a Jaffa leader named Arkad (Craig Fairbrass) who plans to take control of the Jaffa nation and deliver them to the Ori.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E18, Vala's (Claudia Black) father Jacek (guest star Fred Willard) contacts Stargate Command wishing to trade information about a series of planned attacks on Earth in exchange for sanctuary on the planet. Also starring Ben Browder and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Letters From Pegasus
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E17, McKay discovers a way for the team to send messages to Earth, allowing the team to send messages to their loved ones as the Wraith approach the city. Sheppard and Teyla leave Atlantis in the hopes of gathering information about the Wraith army.

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E18, Plagued by terrifying nightmares, Teyla (Rachel Luttrell) begins to recall a time when she and her father were captured by the Wraith and subjected to disturbing experiments. With the help of an old Athosian woman, Teyla looks deep into her past.

programme.title: The Siege (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E19, With a group of Wraith hive ships on the way to Atlantis, the team searches for a place to flee and a way to destroy the city. McKay (David Hewlett) leads a team to try and activate the Ancients' orbital weapons platform to destroy the Wraith.

programme.title: The Siege (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E20, Just as the team is beginning to lose hope, Col. Everett is sent from the Stargate Program on Earth. As Everett and the team strategize, a new battleship, the Daedalus, arrives with a new Zero Point Module, bringing with it new hope.

programme.title: The Siege (Part 3)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E01, The team is saved with the arrival of Colonel Steven Caldwell, the Daedalus, and the destruction of the two approaching Wraith ships. McKay hopes the Zero Point Module will be the key to their success, meanwhile Ford seems off after an accident.

programme.title: Intruder
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E02, Sheppard starts to question things when strange malfunctions begin to occur after the team returns from a trip to Earth. The team discovers that the Daedalus has been infected with a Wraith Virus, causing the ship to go into survival mode.

programme.title: If I Had A Hammer
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E11, During must see a psychiatrist after displaying hostile behavior. Mel agrees with the doctor's recommendation that David be held 72 hours for observation. Steve faces plagiarism charges. The gang helps Willie build a house.

programme.title: Judgment Day
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E12, Steve elects to plead guilty, leaving his punishment to the lenient Chancellor Arnold. Brandon refuses to plead guilty to a crime he did not commit, and faces a hearing andpossible expulsion. Felice objects to Donna's renewed relationship with David.

programme.title: Unnecessary Roughness
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E15, Donna believes she has solved the mystery of her stalker's identity when she sees Garrett Slan, the man who tried to rape her, at the university.

programme.title: Face-Off
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E16, Donna's request for a permanent restraining order against Slan is denied. Tracy accidentally tells Brandon that she loves him. Steve and Clare consider living together as they spend a weekend house sitting. David takes an interest in a young singer.

programme.title: We Interrupt This Program
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E17, Donna's stalker confesses and holds the entire staff of the TV station hostage.

programme.title: With This Ring
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E19, Brandon and Kelly each confess their feelings to friends, but expectthe other person to make a move. Donna tries to reconcile with David. Steve and Clare double date with Ryan and his girlfriend.

programme.title: A Ripe Young Age
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E20, Donna and David visit her grandmother in San Luis Obispo. Noting a striking resemblance between David and her late husband, Mrs. Martin tells the couple about her romance with Donna'sgrandfather.

programme.title: Storm Warnings
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E21, Joey returns to the beach apartment. Rob irritates his manager by seeking Val's advice about whether to sign on for a new movie. Jim and Cindy invite Brandon to spend spring vacation in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Spring Breakdown
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E22, Brandon and Tracy visit Jim in Hong Kong; Cindy is in London helping Brenda cope with mononucleosis. Clare and Steve encourage Kelly to go out instead of moping around the apartment.

programme.title: Heaven Sent
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E23, Mariah comes to town to give a lecture at the university's new age festival. She develops an instant connection with Kelly, prompting Tracy tobristle. David tries to plan a special evening for Donna.

programme.title: All That Jazz
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E26, Brandon has to take care of Kelly and Valerie, who are both laid up with the flu. The girls discuss the reasons for their feud.

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E27, Kelly learns that she is pregnant. Val makes a pass at David, prompting Donna to order him to end their working relationship. Clare is saddened by Mother's Day, so Steve tries to take her mind off things by going for a drive.

programme.title: The Way We Weren't
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E04, Brandon is heartbroken when Kelly is unable to remember their relationship. Valerie helps organize Donna when she has trouble keeping track of her clients. Donna decides to make Val her business partner.

programme.title: Coming Home
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E05, Kelly moves back into the beach apartment. A designer offers to purchase Donna's work. David manages a rock band and allows the lead singer to crash at the apartment.

programme.title: The Right Thing
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E06, Brandon and Donna discover that Rush owns the building that houses the sweatshop. David's credit problems escalate. Kelly fails to identify the shooter from the police lineup.

programme.title: Pride And Prejudice
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E07, Brandon's overprotection alienates Kelly; Donna learns she's been stabbed in the back by Valerie, who juggles her rich man and her poor man on a dinner cruise attended by Steve and Carly.

programme.title: Child Of The Night
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E10, Erica is arrested for prostitution and released into Kelly and Brandon's custody. Jodi claims that Steve is the only man who could have possibly fathered her child. Mel helps David file for bankruptcy and pay back Donna.

programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E116, Flash flood surrounds elderly couple in pick up truck/10 yr. old babysitter calls 911 for a stranger banging on the door.

programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E179, The car is stolen with an infant in the back. A woman smashes her car into a boulder and needs to be rescued.

programme.title: Cribbage Choke/Patrol Car Fire
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E213, A 2-year-old puts a small game piece in his mouth, eventually getting it caught in his throat. A mother and a 3-year-old are about to jump from a second story window to avoid fire when help arrives.

programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E107, One man threatens to commit suicide / Man is stung by yellow jackets
